title: Countdown For Locking Champions
body:
I suggest Riot should make a anti-Insta locking countdown timer in normals because most of the time people say their lane first and another person calls the same lane second then that person insta locks. Personally, I think that Riot should make it 20 seconds until you can lock in your champion, that way we all have time to negotiate who is in which lane. 

Any Suggestions On This Idea?

replies.body: It wouldn't change anything, but the new champ select is coming soon so look forward to that!

Just to be clear, that wouldn't help as they would just lock at the end of the 20 seconds.

But yeah hopefully the new champ select will be available in norm's.

RIOT are going to be handling this, the new Champion Select (Posted here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/Mc1nPqMw-new-champion-select-coming-to-ranked-soon) Should be taking over the current Blind pick for Normals! We will be having Draft Normal permanently instead of Blind Normal, this is happening on every server also!

TL;DR The changes to Ranked Champion Select are also happening to Normals.
My Discussion is about normals (not ranked) but thanks for letting me know!

Yes, but the fact is that I posted this to let you know that Normals is going to feel like ranked, Riot are replacing the Normals Blind Pick to Draft pick. So some people whom instalock have to wait until their turn to pick (exactly like Ranked).

I agree I've played 3 games in a row with a guy who inst locked onto jungle even though i called shots on jungle first.
Anybody who Insta-lock is just a crappy teammate and shouldnt be playing on LOL
